author: Alan Gardner
title: 'It's a scary time... no one knows how long this will last' - Sam Curran
description: England allrounder talks about staying fit in lockdown and launching a fundraiser in support of the NHS | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: England allrounder Sam Curran had been expecting to spend April 2 preparing for Chennai Super Kings' first home game of the 2020 IPL. Instead, like cricketers around the world, he is currently trying to keep his fitness up while remaining housebound in respon… [+5772 chars]
